0.1.name: wordpress/canyon
0.1.description: An elegant, versatile and magazine style theme with easy customization options. It features a modern design, post excerpts with thumbnails, header, background, fixed-width, widget-ready and threaded comments. Canyon theme also comes with custom Menus support and other cool features. Tested with major browsers - Mozilla Firefox, Internet Explorer, Opera, Safari and Chrome. Check Canyon Official Page in case you need directions.
